data.title: Early College Opportunities at South High School
data.text:
High School Course Bakersfield College - Dual Enrollment Course Career Choices STDV B3 Career, Life, and Educational Planning (3.0) Career Ed COMM B1 Public Speaking (3.0) Spanish 3 HP SPAN B1 Elementary Spanish I (4.0) English 12 HP ENGL B1A Expository English (3.0) Drawing and Painting ART B2 Drawing 1 (3.0)

Certificate and Degree Pathways

CSU General Education Breadth Certificate of Achievement

Intersegmental General Education Transfer Curriculum (IGETC) Certificate of Achievement

For more information, visit General Education Patterns.

*Courses and pathways are subject to change.
